content: **from the yarnspirations webpage ** *shadows reflect beautifully on this crochet blanket with a mesmerizing visual effect add intrigue to any space using the color that accentuates your home from red heart comfort with so many shades available it s easy to craft a custom version of this amazing pattern it s a layer of distinction that earns compliments wherever it s displayed * yardage for baby blanket 34 square and large throw 48 x65 respectively skill level easy from the red heart website vary the colors and size to create a warm throw suitable for a nap on the couch or a cuddle in the rocking chair front and back post stitches provide the interesting texture
